entry.title: [US][Backbone] - Equipment replacement
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 1, 00:00 - 03:00 UTC

Sep 15, 23:32 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention. A future update will indicate the date and time of the operation

Sep 15, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 7, 22:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/09/2022 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers may experience some loss of service during the operations.
Service improvement : A network equipment will be replaced.
